page.title: 15Whitehills Fishing Values
page.content:
I am part owner of the{BERYL.}She represents a capital investment of about{Â£430 000.}Her yearly turn-over would be about {Â£280 000.}Running Costs would be about {Â£2 000}weekly: Fuel Â£800 Food Â£100 Ice Â£100 Transport Â£100 Insurance Â£300 Salesman Â£300 {*} Rentals Â£300 {** } I would consider a good day's catch 60 boxes or upwards.
{*} The fish salesman handles the shore side of operations for 5% of the gross
{**}The{BERYL}carries a wide range of electronic fish-finding communications and navigational equipment,hired from and maintained by the manufacturers.
